channel.title: Pie Dough :: Recipe Book
channel.description: Ingredients Ingredient Â½ Batch 1 Batch All-Purpose Flour 200g 400g Salt 4g 8g Sugar (optional, for sweet pies) 10g 20g Unsalted Butter (cold, cubed) 120g 240g Ice Water 60g 120g Method Mix Dry Ingredients: In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, and sugar (if using). Cut in Butter: Add cold, cubed butter. Using a pastry cutter or fingertips, work butter into flour until mixture resembles coarse crumbs with some pea-sized pieces.
